title: Forecast of lanthanum oxide price globally 2009 to 2025
yAxis: Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton
summary: Overall Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton has decreased over the Year.

Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, gradually decreasing from 2018 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton, of value 7904.0 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Price in U.S. dollars per metric ton about 6447.0 was reached at Year 2021
